FuncDef: The system-view command enables the system to enter the system view from the user view.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the mode of validating the configuration without committing the configuration.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The system supports two configuration validation modes: immediate validation and two-phase validation.
Run the system-view command to enter the system view. You can edit configurations in two-phase validation mode. In two-phase validation mode, run the commit command after editing configurations to make the configurations take effect.Run the system-view immediately command to enter the system view. You can edit configurations in immediate validation mode. In immediate validation mode, press Enter after entering a command to make the configuration take effect immediately.

Precautions
In a command prompt, HUAWEI is the default host name of the Router. The prompt indicates the current view. The prompt "<HUAWEI>" indicates the user view, and the prompt "[HUAWEI]" indicates the system view in the immediate validation mode, and the prompt "[*HUAWEI]" indicates the system view in the two-phase validation mode. In two-phase validation mode, if any configurations are not submitted in the system, * is used for identification in the view. If all configurations have been submitted in the system, ~ is used for identification in the view.
